title: ğŸ  The House Analogy Guide to Quarto & GitHub
text:
1 Preface
Welcome to ğŸ  The House Analogy Guide to Quarto & GitHub.
This guide will teach beginners how to:

set up Quarto
build a book project
connect it to GitHub
publish it online using GitHub Pages

We will use a simple house-building analogy to make each step clear and easy to remember.

title: 1Â  Introduction
text:
This is a book created from markdown and executable code.
See Knuth (1984) for additional discussion of literate programming.
